DOC.brief_title: Safety Study Parathyroid Hormone Patients Needing Additional Stem Cell Mobilization .
DOC.detailed_description: Patients start treatment within 21 day determination inadequate mobilization . PTH treatment give 4 cohort : 40 mcg , 60 mcg , 80 mcg , 10 mcg . PTH give day 1 continue stem cell collection complete maximum 20 day . G-CSF 10 mcg/kg give day 10-14 continue stem cell collection complete . Patients inadequate CD34+ cell Day 14 meet study criterion continue PTH/G-CSF .
DOC.criteria: Disease status : NHL HD refractory chemotherapy , relapse , high risk first remission ; multiple myeloma ; AML second subsequent remission first remission adverse cytogenetics antecedent hematologic disorder . Failed one two mobilization attempt . ECOG performance status 0 , 1 , 2 . Cardiac disease : symptomatic congestive heart failure , angina pectoris uncontrolled hypertension Pulmonary disease : severe chronic obstructive lung disease , symptomatic restrictive lung disease . Renal disease : serum creatinine > 2 mg/dl Hepatic disease : SGOT SGPT > 3x normal ; serum bilirubin > 2.0 mg/dl due Gilbert 's syndrome hemolysis Calcium > 10.5 Phosphate < 1.6 Uncontrolled infection Pregnancy breast feeding mother
